license_title: Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and License (PDDL)

organization.description: Group for Economics data especially that which is [open data](http://opendefinition.org/). This can be any kind of data related to economics from development to finance, and micro to macro. We run an open group policy so anyone can add datasets to this group but we will review datasets added to the group for quality.
organization.title: Economics Datasets
organization.name: economics

name: thatcher-wages-middle-ages
notes:
Daily Wages of Thatchers in the Middle Ages from *Standards of Living in the Later Middle Ages*, Christopher Dyer, Cambridge University Press, 1989, p. 206 via <http://www.fordham.edu/halsall/source/medievalprices.html>

Note that these look to be nominal not real values.
title: Thatcher Wages in the Middle Ages
